title: Mexican Chicken and Corn Salad
ingredients: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
¼ cup cooked black beans, rinsed and drained
1 (4 ounce) Libby's® Sweet Corn Vegetable Cup
instructions:
1. Season chicken breast with salt, freshly ground black pepper, and smoky paprika (optional).
2. Heat a grill pan and add 1 tablespoon olive oil. Add chicken breast and cook for 6 minutes on each side. Ensure an instant-read thermometer reads at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C). Remove from grill pan and allow chicken to cool.
3. Place tomatoes, chopped lettuce, beans, and Libby's corn into a bowl.
4. In a separate small bowl, whisk together lime juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
5. Place the cooled chicken breast onto a cutting board and cut into 1-inch pieces.
6. Pour the dressing over the veggies and lettuce and toss. Add the chopped chicken to the salad. Sprinkle with cheese and bacon bits (optional).
7. Serve salad with tortilla chips or incorporate them into the salad.
